about_the_game:
Phantompunk is a 2D, story-driven, side-scroller game. The game takes place in a dark sinister setting where the player can navigate the environment and interact with other characters to progress through the story.

Story:

Even though his life didn't unfold the way he envisioned, Varlu still felt content that his story was about to come to an end. Just seconds prior to his scheduled execution, a mysterious entity interrupted the scene and abducted him to a place out of this world. Thrown into the confines of what looks like hell, Varlu is about to discover the sinister intent behind this abduction.

Gameplay:

Keyboard input is required to move around and progress through the game.

Warnings:

- Game is intended for mature audience only as it may contain scenes of horror, violence and gore.

- Game should be strictly avoided by individuals who are at risk of photosensitivity, epileptic seizures, blackouts or heart diseases.

- Game sets in a fictitious world. Any resemblance to real-world events, ideas or people is pure coincidence.

Credits:

Lead Dev: Kai M

Artwork & Animation: V.Aoyama

Sound: Phil Michalski

Illustration: Happi Shmeppir and Ghostype

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 7900
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster

short_description: Not thrilled that fate has led him into the confines of a sinister place, Varlu is left with no choice but to come face to face with many types of demons, including his very own.
